body_content.explanation: a person who carries a flag, especially at a ceremony:
examples: She will be the flag bearer for the opening ceremony of the Games.
The country's flag bearer will be a veteran speed skater.
At the ceremony, the flag bearer followed the president to the gravesite.

body_content.explanation: a person who encourages an idea or value and starts to represent it:
examples: The president is our flag bearer, out in front of our people.
The company is seen as a flag bearer for sustainable development.
